discoveryMode: You are currently in Discovery mode. To access AI products offered by OVHcloud, you need to activate your project.
authDescription: You have to sign in to use OVHcloud AI services, and create your first notebook, job, or app.
cliParagraphe1: Use our ovhai interface to access and manage your notebooks, jobs and applications in command lines (CLI).
cliParagraphe2: Select the region you want to use:
alertCli: Be sure to restart your machine so that you can use ovhai.
cliParagraphe3: You can authenticate on the platform via all
cliParagraphe3Ter: configured within the same Public Cloud project.
cliParagraphe4: The authentication steps are as follows:
cliList2: select authentication type in terminal or via browser
cliList3: enter the user’s login details or their associated token
cliCommandParagraphe1Bis: to get a list of available actions.
reversibilityDescription: OVHcloud takes sovereignty and freedom of personal data very seriously. You can recover your data at any time using standard protocols.
calculationDescription: With industrialised datacentres and automated deployments, OVHcloud offers high computing capacity at the best price for data analytics.
securityDescription: As the cloud provider responsible for hosting personal data, our commitment involves respecting data confidentiality.
conformityDescription: Our cloud infrastructures and services are ISO/IEC 27001, 27017, 27018 and 27701 certified. Thanks to our health data hosting compliance, you can host French healthcare data securely.
openSourceDescription: In the world of data, open-source solutions are now the most successful and highest-performing products. OVHcloud chooses to base its solutions on open-source software, such as the Apache Hadoop and Apache Spark suites.
